content:
Posted: August 12, 2015
												If you're looking for an all in 1 game... this is it.Gamemodes: PS There are a lot more than theseDarkRP - In this gamemode, you roleplay with your friends inside a City. Follow the Law, or Break it!  Generally considered one of the easy types of Roleplay. 1942 RP - In this gamemode , you roleplay in Nazi Germany. Players can be a Nazi, Resistance, or Citizen and follow the harsh laws of 1942 created by Hitler. Hitler can, and has a tendency to be killed.Extreme Football Throwdown - The only American football gamemode you'll ever want to play. Tackle other players, slam them against walls and ceilings, or just pummel them to death with your fists. Get the ball in the enemy goal area to score a touch down. Comes with tons of wacky weapons and powerups.Zworld Afterlife - Survival horror gamemode.CW: HL2RP - In this gamemode, you Roleplay as either citizens or CPs in the HL2 universe.  Do you become a CP and fight crime?  Or do you Rebel and try to escape the City you live in?  Or do you go about your daily business?  (NOTE: CW: HL2 RP is a serious Roleplay gamemode!  It is usually suggested you read the rules before playing, or you can be accused of a lot of things).Cinema - Go to a virtual movie theater and watch YouTube videos with other players.Trouble In Terrorist Town- In this gamemode, you are all terrorists, however hidden amongst you are one or more traitors. Who can you trust? Kill the traitors before they kill you!Prop Hunt - In this gamemode you can take control of either the Hunters or the Props, and try to see who can survive the longest.  If you're a Prop, try to not get caught by the Hunters, who are out to get you!Murder - In this gamemode there is a murderer amongst you. Like TTT, you don't know who to trust or who to kill!  The only one you can trust is the guy with the gun, but can he trust you?Jailbreak - In this gamemode, your job is to try to break out of a jail.  As a Prisoner, you can choose to follow the orders from the Warden, or go against him and try to kill the guards.  As a Guard, you keep the peace! Do what the warden says!Deathrun - In this gamemode, your job is to try to run and get to the end of the course, while dodging the traps along the path.  As a Runner, you have to run to the end of the Deathrun course, while dodging every obstacle along the way.  As Death, your job is to try and kill of every Runner possible using every contraption on the Deathrun Course.Sledbuild In this gamemode, you need to build the fastest sled you ever made and race with people who is the first one that finish and win.NS: HL2 RP - In this gamemode, you Roleplay as either citizens or CPs in the HL2 universe.  Do you become a CP and fight crime?  Or do you Rebel and try to escape the City you live in?  Or do you go about your daily business?  (NOTE: NS: HL2 RP is a serious Roleplay gamemode!  It is usually suggested you read the rules before playing, or you can be accused of a lot of things).PERP - In this gamemode, you take the role as a citizen in a large city.  Do you become a fire fighter? A Medic? Cop? Salesman?  The choice is yours!  Generally considered the intermidiate Roleplay gamemode, as you need Levels and skill requirements before getting a certain thing.Garry's Mod Stranded - In this Gamemode, you play as a survivor, stranded in a foriegn environment, and you have to survive!  Build nice buildings, raid other tribes, drink water, and much more! Just be sure you don't run out of Health, Hunger, Thirst, and Fatigue.  [Based on the 2003 Unreal Software game Stranded]Minigames - Exactly what you think.  In this gamemode, you and many other people chose between various mini-games to compete in.  These range from Climb, to AWP, to Surf, to Obstacle Course, and more.ZombieRP - In this gamemode, you play the Zombie Apocalypse version of DarkRP.  Play as a Survivor, or a Military Man to try to keep the peace.  Jobs don't earn much, so you probably will be killing Zombies for money.The Stalker - In this gamemode, you play the Gmod version of Hidden Source, with some slight changes.  Play as Unit 17, and try to kill the Stalker with your balanced guns and equipment.  Or, play as the Stalker, and try to kill Unit 17 with your claws and Psychic abilities.Hunger Games - In this gamemode, you play as a Tribute in the Hunger Games!  Play with your friends, or trust no one and kill everyone on sight!Flood - In this gamemode, you build boats to escape the oncoming flood.  Once you've done so, you must then destroy other players boats to earn money for more props and weapons the next round.NS: Metro 2033 RP - This is a serious RP game mode. Much like NS HL2RP, it normally follows similar rules to serious RP game modes like HL2 but ultimately depends on the communities. You play either can play a lone metro dweller or volunteer yourself to the harsh reality of war by joining the Red Line or the 4th Reich. Mutants can lurk in the abandoned tunnels. This Game mode is based on your own survival, you can tell your own story as you wish, be your own person.F2S Stronghold - In this gamemode, you must fight off other players while also build a stronghold to defend yourself.  Kill players for money, and build advanced constructions to keep yourself safe.Zombie Survival/Outbreak - Different Names, same concept.  In this gamemode, you play as a Survivor or a Zombie in order to Survive the oncoming Apocolypse!  As a survivor, stock up on Guns and Ammo and try to help you and your fellow survivors live through the Night!  As a zombie, you must ruthlessly kill every survivor you see as a Headcrab, a Ghoul, or any other Zombies available!MORBUS - A combination of The Thing and TTT. In this gamemode you have to survive in a science fiction environment, while being hunted by Aliens.  As a survivor, you must stack up on Guns and Ammo, as well do all of you other daily activities, like eating and sleeping.  As an alien, you have to spread the Alien Virus around to everyone else by killing them as an Alien!HaloRP - A mix between DarkRP and Halo, in this gamemode you roleplay with your friends in this Halo universe by being a citizen or fighting the UNSC or the Covenant, Choose your side and try to withstand the Alien Invaders or Destroy the human race or perhaps Rebel and free yourself from the UNSC government! AlteredRP.com & TFG are the two main communities that host it.Zombie Escape - In this gamemode, you play as a survivor or zombie as you try to escape the area.  As a Survivor, you have only your unlimited ammo carrying guns and your fellow Survivors with you to survive the oncoming Zombie Horde.  As a Zombie, you must spread the Zombie Infestation by killing the Survivors before they escape!Propkill - For Real Propkillers To Test Themselves, DarkRP Minges Are Not Allowed.Razborka!- Two teams of drunken russians fight in 4 differents sub-gamemodes, either killing the other team, stealing their vodka or finding the filthy vodka thief.Freerun Combat - Two teams eliminate each other with throwing knives while parkouring.MelonRacer - you race as a melon.Parkour - Climb buildings, perform wall runs, enjoy many awesome events like pvp, zombies, and much more all in this fantastic gamemode.The Purge - A sort of DarkRP but still an adaptation of the movie "The Purge".Slave of GMod - A gamemode inspired of Dennation Game's "Hotline Miami" game series.HarborRP - A gamemode like DarkRP but with islands.Bunny Hop - A gamemode where you try to complete an obsticle course as fast as you can by bunny hopping.Fallout Roleplay - A gamemode based off the Fallout Series, like DarkRP but a post-apocalyptic enviroment.

												*IMPORTANT*: Must have Counter Strike to have texture and files or else you will experience black and purple hell.Garry's Mod is sandbox game that enables you to spawn stuff to play around with and go wild with your imagination. You can spawn characters from your favorite games to mess around with your friends or even play solo. Not only that but the steam workshop allows players more stuff to spawn to play around with! It not only has sandbox mode but a variety of other modes such as the famous Trouble in Terriost Town (TTT), Role play, Zombies, and much more! Gary's mod provides countless hours of gameplay and fun so what are you waiting for? Go buy this game now especially if its on sale.One of my personal most played games on steam.

content:
Posted: January 5, 2014
												Garry's Mod takes all the characters, effects and props out of all your favorite Source Engine games (such as Counter Strike, Half Life, Portal and many more) , and gives you the tools you may need to make whatever you want.You can weld, rope, pulley, attach a turret and a few thrusters to a chair and fly around shooting at the world aimlessly, with a downloaded Iron Man sNPC shooting you with a pistol.If you think your current games' content isn't enough, you have over 200,000 addons to choose from in the Steam Workshop, adding new tools, weapons, characters, maps and gamemodes.Garry's Mod isn't just a game, it's a strong base for you to build on. Anything you can dream becomes possible in Garry's Mod. Whether that dream is a nightmare is up to youIncredible. Recommended 10/10

content:
Posted: February 17, 2014
												Gmod is a sandbox game sorta like Terraria Minecraft TF2 and HL2 mixed in one. The controls are the same as HL2 but some changes since it was realesed 2 years after HL2 but its good. The physics are like the ones in TF2 and Terraria when your player falls. The newbies and mingebags are the real problems there having a hard time getting used to it so teach em! Garry's Mod creator is really hard to play with him because he normal spends time in singleplayer or whitelisted servers so "Yes im the real Garry" acheivment is sort of impossible to get so dont bother trying to get it. The Rating is over all of a 9/10 to me and removing toybox was a bad idea, we all knew a month ago the addon menu got messed up and i lost my addons too so shut up about it its fine now! So the physics are meh but creation of gmod was the first start of an animation carrer. BUY DIS GAME OR BE LEFT OUT OF ALL THE FUN!

content:
Posted: December 21, 2015
												TL;DR: It's a great game, while its not for everybody. it is fun and amazing. but if you dont like sandbox games, simply dont buy it.So, Gmod has been out for a while, and i've made stuff for this here and there. But i was reading reviews and noticed there isn't really a completely indepth review that never talks about making addons for gmod. With all of that out the way, Here we go! (also i know this isn't the best of reviews but its my first real review) The game by itself (No other source games and addons) It's♥♥♥♥♥♥ its just half-life 2 with a few tools and no objective at all. Ha just kidding; the game comes with a gamemode called trouble in terrorist to- o right you need CS:S for that to work properly :/ Community and online interactions The Community is ehh... ok i gues???? theres a lot of nice people here and there but theres ocasionally the little kid that always gets his chode wet over FNAF/Sonic. Theres also some fun Gamemodes like DarkRP and Smash; but beware, if your pc is slow joining server may crash you. The workshop however is a great place, which brings me to my next thing and what i really wanna talk about in this review THE WORKSHOP!	The workshop is where you get all the addons and stuff, it's a great way of sharing things too IMO. things you can find in the workshop are:Custom models & SoundsPlayer modelsCustom weaponsCustom NPCSAnd much much more...(theres also no NSFW content there)There are however some limitations to the things you can get there. And not everything will be perfect and compatible to eachother. The thing that gets me the most however are animations; you can't make custom playermodel animations. And no, it's not a engine limitation. its a fault on Garry's part. You see, view model hands are a great example; they contain no animations and can adapt to other animations made by the creator of whatever addon. Garry, if you ever read this. ♥♥♥♥ing fix that NOW Errors on the community's fault Skip this part if you are not planning to make addons yourself Theres 2 things that bother me the most, ♥♥♥♥♥♥ dupes and saves along with recolors, and the lack of documentation. While the dupes and saves things is self explanatory; the documentation is not. To put it simple it took me 5 months to figure out how to ♥♥♥♥ing port. while there is multiple sources. you can never find what you are looking for directly, i never found a guide how to make a playermodel, or how to make a prop or anything like that. you're best off decompiling a model and reverse engineering that♥♥♥♥♥♥  Gameplay with Addons & CS:S	Pretty much one of the funnest things you will ever do, just look through the workshop and think of stuff you could do. Overall review i'll give it a 8.5/10 while it is fun; most of this game is made up by the Community, which while good; its not the best. if you don't like sandboxy games, and games where everything looks cheap and not fancy with amazing graphics; please stay away. And if you like to make stuff for use in a game, This is a great thing to start with. While it is hard to figure out how to do things. It really is worth it.

content:
Posted: March 2, 2014
												Probably the best sandbox physics game I've played, and it has an extremely active community so you can expect constant (and fun) mods to play around with. My favorite mods as of current has to be the Trouble in Terrorist Town mod and the Firearms: Source 2.0 mod. I also enjoy Prophunt and messing around with NPCs. The only downfall to the game is that not only do the mods take up a lot of valuable harddrive space, but playing singleplayer gets lonely very fast.I would recommend this to all my friends, it's a really nice game.8/10

number of helpful: 5 of 5 people (100%) found this review helpful
content:
Posted: August 23, 2014
												So I was looking at my list of games most played and it turns out Garry's Mod is snuggled up there in #2nd place, nestled between Team Conga Simulator 2 and Civilization Vee. My old review was so cringe inducing that your face had a high probability of warping inside of itself to avoid reading the♥♥♥♥♥♥linen words. Christ, why was it so cringy? What went through my mind that ultimately led to me vomitting on my keyboard and hitting enter? Man, that's crazy. I don't even remember cleaning vomit off of my keyboard. Maybe that never even happened. Could I be making all this up? Was there ever even a keyboard? How do we know keyboards even exist? What am I typing on? A Keyboard? Oh, okay, I guess they do exist then. It'd be pretty crazy if they didn't though. It'd be as crazy as a mouse not existing. Imagine, a world without mice. Shows like Tom and Jerry would just be called Tom and himself. Or maybe just Tom. Or it could be called "A Descent Into Madness: The Tomcat Tale." Oh. I get it. That's why his name is Tom, because of the word "Tomcat." But then why is Jerry's name Jerry? Because it rhymes with berry, and it's small like a berry? Or maybe he was named after Jerry Seinfeld? The resemblance is uncanny.Oh, Garry's Mod? Yeah, it's alright.

number of helpful: 5 of 5 people (100%) found this review helpful
content:
Posted: February 13, 2016
												Garry Garry Garry!This is after I hated the game and then got it for my wife and actually loved the game! Graphics: This is a Valve game, what type of graphics do you want from this? Hey are the same as every other Valve game and offer nothing special or amazing, heck these would probably run on a mobile device they are so basic!Audio: The same as above, the audio is the same as all the other Valve games and probably a copy and paste from them... It would not surprise me!Controls: The controls again are the same as above, nothing special but certainly easy to get used too, with the console to bind certain things. Very easy to pickup and play instantly. Game: This is where the game changes from anything else around!It all depends what you want to do in the game because the online has tons of mods from prop hunt (which is everyone's favourite, where you had as a prop like a banana while players hunters you) or death run (basically tomb raider running through an obstacle course trying to survive while another player sets of traps to kill you), GTA, murder, who am I etc etc etc, seriously the list is huge with what game contains and is created... Also the awesome thing is you do not need to download these mods a website, it's all If you do not like any of the above and want to create your own stuff you can, the game is basically a sandbox version of mine craft where you take anything and create anything with a mega tool box built in and you can do and create anything. It's insane!The only problem with the game is texture packs which Steam basically tries to force you to buy all their games, install them and use their textures, but thankfully there is a free workaround allowing you them, drop in file and no errors or problems at all... Google for an answer or read below for how to get around this:Basically go here: {LINK REMOVED}http://kajar9.wix.com/♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥2#!downloads/chgdOnce here, press the RED MEGA button for "GAME CONTENT"Once they are downloaded, extract them and you will get a folder.. Make sure it is not a folder within a folder and then the content... Example "TF2>TF2>Content" which is wrong, it should be "TF2>Content" then it is correct.  Cut the folder and go to your Steam folder>Steamapps> Common> Garry's Mod> Garry's Mod> Addons (If the folder is not then then create it) and just paste in there.  Do the same for EVERY Game Content that allows you to download, just place, load Garry's Mod and look at the bottom right the Spanner about games and they will show an X but do not worry, load a lobby and you will have perfect textures with no pink and black squares anymore :)You could also do this for the maps folder and place in here, aswell as extract EACH file out and place in the maps folder as one giant load.  Not sure which works best but I did both!Would I recommend this game? Of course, it is a fantastic game offering tons of hours of enjoyment and a huge replay ability.

content:
Posted: April 5, 2013
												After spending so many hours into this game , I realized many things. Online slowly filled itself with Thousands of ♥♥♥♥♥♥ DarkRP servers , aswell as poorly made Sandbox and the list goes on. The online of this game became or completely unfunny or boring (which is pretty much the same when I think about it). Many people might tell me that I'm wrong though.I can't blame too much the graphics since it's on the Source Engine , it's old but not bad. Although what I can really blame is the updates. The game isn't updated enough so you sometimes stay with poor glitches that are almost never fixed. Addons also have their part , since no support is given to them (which I completely understand) , your game can crash for no reason. And once you have one broken addon , good luck fixing the problem especially if you have more than 30. Talking about crashes , the game can corrupt files , I am not joking , sometimes Garry's Mod can corrupt files from many games such as Half Life 2 or Left 4 Dead and other games. Fixing this can take a while and is annoying , sometimes forcing you to uninstall the game completely. Rare corruption will sometimes crash your Steam , and then ...... It'll be the turn of your PC. No joke that happened to me more than 5 times.I don't want to write a book about what's wrong or what's right so I'll end it there. Buy this game if you want to play with friends or on Solo , but multiplayer is not a fun place to go , you have my word on that.

content:
Posted: October 13, 2014
												A Game Built around Creativity and the wickedly popular Source Engine Classics such as Half-Life 2 and Counter Strike: Source. This game allows you to take the role of the maker. While other games of this engine allow you to point and shoot. You may point, and build. I have had my fun and money's worth 100 fold at least. For this game has brought me over a thousand hours of fun with friends that I can not comprehend otherwise. I do recommend this Game. To any and all. To those who wish to have fun with a Great Community of builders, role-player's, and FPS Shooters. Explore the server browser with hundreds of player integrated gamemodes, whether your style is FPS, which can be found in TTT. Or some Serious and Non-Serious Roleplay: CW:HL2RP, DarkRP. Whatever your taste and Style Garry's Mod has something for you.Gameplay: 10/10Graphics: 9.9/10Community: 8.725/10Replayability: 10/10Unfortunately this game is on a downward turn. As the masses and communities start to smallen. So does the Game Itself. As it fades into the mists of time, let us remember what great times we have had. That is all from me. I hope this Helps.

												GARRYS MOD---------This game is a pretty well done game it's graphics are alright it could use with a buff.This game has loads of gamemodes the most popular ones would be- Trouble in terriost town- DarkRP- Deathrun- Prophunt- Murder- SandboxThose are just some of the popular ones that most people play and enjoy.--------------------Trouble in terriost townTTT is a very popular gamemode were you have a Traitor, Detective, and Innocent The Traitors aim is to eliminate the detectives and innocent's one by one. But the innocent's can fight back.The detectives job is to use there DNA Scanner to find who killed an innocent that just died.The innocent's are just there to kill and call out the traitors.---------------SandboxYou can download many mapsBut the deafults are large, and flat. So you can create and build you're absoulte heart out.Create anythink going from tanks to jets! flying pigs and fun mods!Very straight foward and halirously fun :D.----------------DarkRP A open world were you deal guns kill people, roam the street's and get jobs to make cash so you can buy more guns.and have aton of fun with your friends!---------------------------DeathrunThere are runners that have to run thought dangerous trap's why there are people called deaths activating deadly spikes/lava pits and all other cool stuff.--------------------------Prop huntYou are a chair to table to coffe mug to tv to mouse to computer running around and screaming for help while humans chase you! to destory you and you're prop friends.------------Murder Oh no theres a murder on the loose we only have 3-1 guy with a gun what are we going to do. *I heard he has a knife**I heard he can run super fast*--------------------------------That about wraps up garrys mod if there are further questions you want to ask just PM me.There is no DLC for this game...HAVE FUN!

Garry's Mod game reviewAbout the gameGarry's Mod (GMod) is a singleplayer and multiplayer sandbox physics game by Garry Newman.Many mods, custom content, many games and modes. Good buy. The community generated content is great and the amount of creativity within the game itself is absolutely amazing. There are custom game types, skins, buildings, models, textures, maps, softwares and a whole lot more.Pros:Availability of mapsAmount of contentMinigame and RPG serversCreativity levelCons:Can take some time joining another user's server (downloading custom content)Sometimes see "Error" signs instead of the actual object (if there is custom content)Restrictions on some items in certain serversFPS problems if there are to many objects on screen

content:
Posted: July 19, 2016
												So I looked in my reviews section and I had seen I didn't write a review for Garry's Mod. I thought to myself "Holy crap, how have I not made one for Gmod yet?", hence the reason why you are seeing this review now.Garry's Mod is, as the description portrays, a physics sandbox. They give you the tools and the rest is up to you. It's a very simple concept, but it goes a long way. In Gmod, literally anything is possible. You can play a first-person version of Clue, plant explosive melons on people, kill NPCs with props, and so much more. Possibilites are only limited to your imagination, and with the help of its great workshop base, you can spend countless hours trying out new addons.The reason I like Gmod is because of all these, but also because it isn't just a game. To me, Garry's Mod is more of a tool. When used correctly, you can create stunning works of art with ragdolls and post-processing effects. My digital art skills have been improved (and more or less acquired) through the use of Gmod. All of my current profile pictures were created in Gmod, regardless of whether they have been modified in SAI or not. Take into consideration also, the hundreds of Gmod artists that create a range of artworks, from simple screenshots to SFM-quality posters. Gmod's potential as a tool is what draws me the most to it, and I think that for this reason artists as well as players can pick it up and play it.I rate Gmod a 9/10. It's quite honestly better than any art creation program possible, since you can do everything right within the game itself.

content:
Posted: December 6, 2016
 Introduction Garry's Mod. A fun, sandbox-style, do-what-you-want kind of game. At least, that's what it's advertised as, and what people say about it. Garry's Mod, is, however, very unique. The base game is one gamemode and 2 maps, with HL2 content such as weapons and props. That's about it. What provides the magnitude of content is the community itself. Since it's release, there has been a plethora of content added and created for this quite simple mod. So why would I, someone with over 2000 hours of this game, not recommend this game? There's a ton of reasons for this, and I could legitimately write a book about it, but I'm going to boil it down to a set of main ideas. Gamemodes Gamemodes are, strictly speaking, the heart of Garry's Mod. There are a range of gamemodes available, each with their own interesting rules and gameplay. Or, at least there would be, if it wasn't for the fact that literally only about 5 of these gamemodes are played, and have oversaturated the server browser. These are; Trouble in Terrorist Town, Murder, DarkRP (Or any very mildly modified varient, they all count), Prop Hunt, and Deathrun. I'm leaving Sandbox out of it, because it's Sandbox. Let's boil these down to what they should be, and what they actually are:1. Trouble in Terrorist TownTrouble in Terrorist Town, or TTT for short, is a gamemode where you're meant to find out which of your comrades are Traitors, and eliminate them, or kill everyone else if you're the Traitors yourself. On the face of it, it's quite intriguing. You do this by investigating bodies, and determine which of your fellow terrorists are not what they seem, based on location at time of death, weapon, and if they were seen committing the deed. However, what it really is is an oversaturation of addons that do not work together, dropping framerates and killing any sense of mystery (Because they wear ♥♥♥♥ing cosmetics!), overly abusive admins who usually are 12 and paid for it using Mum's credit card, trigger-happy ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ who thought sniffing the air around them was construed as an attempt on their life, and then yell "RDM" at the top of their lungs to every available admin, who will then ban at request without investigating claims. It takes about 50 hours of  pulling your hair out  searching through all servers to find an actual decent one.2. MurderOh, boy, did you expect a paragraph? Well, you're out of luck, this gamemode has literally been made for YouTubers, and it is a dumbed-down version of TTT, except there are NO good servers. At all. Next.3. DarkRPDarkRP. A place where dreams go to die and people pretend to be someone else. Which is odd, because on the face of it, it looks like people could be extremely creative and have fun. ON THE FACE OF IT. The idea is you can get various "Jobs" in city life, or make your own if you're just a basic citizen. The only real rules that are universal is the fact that you don't kill people without reason, and if you die you don't get to remember your previous life. But, in reality, very few jobs are actually played, usually as a result of server rules preventing you from doing anything actually fun. As well as this, server owners again oversaturate the server with about 50000 different addons and have a 60-slot server, which then results in 200 ping and laggy-as-♥♥♥♥ gameplay even if the server is shoved right up your♥♥♥♥♥ 4. Prop HuntProp Hunt is as it is. You hide as a variety of props, and hide from the Hunters, and the Hunters look for props. I actually don't have an issue with this mode, except for the universal oversaturated addons list and laggy servers as a result. Some server are vanilla Prop Hunt, and not much can then go wrong. 5. DeathrunDeathrun is Deathrun. Runners try to avoid traps set off by Death, and you are eliminated on death. Runners try to survive and then kill Death, and Death kills all runners with traps. Sounds simple. HOWEVER, because of the nature of this mode, which is no element of mystery, server owners fill it with pointshop loot that you sometimes have to pay REAL MONEY for to get, as well as 187562 different large-as mods and voice lines which clog the server up and renders the game unplayable, due to lag. And as a side-effect, the players get 200 ping at about 12 players on the server, even if you again, for some reason, decide to put the server box right up your ♥♥♥♥ing♥♥♥♥♥ Addons Addons are what adds to the experience of Sandbox, by adding numerous vehicles, weapons, weapon mods, NPC's, models, props, and effects. Now, this sounds fine, if it weren't for the way the main distribution platform worked. Oh boy, strap yourselves in, it's going to be a bumpy ride!1. The Steam Workshop, Garrysmod.org, Toybox, and youNow, you may be thinking, "What are those two latter distribution platforms?". Well, as of nowadays, they're a graveyard. But before Gmod 13, these were the main sources of addons. This had its disadvantages and advantages, because it meant going directly into your Gmod folders and manually placing addons, and actually going onto these websites directly in the case of Garrysmod.org, or downloading an addon which you had to access in a menu on Gmod, but this then meant it wasn't always there clogging your addons list, in the case of Toybox. This difficulty to install and upload was a godsend, because this meant you usually only found high-quality, good content that people had made. The Steam Workshop, however, is an easy distribution platform which allows content creators to develop and share their work with the players of Garry's Mod. Well that does work to an extent like that. BUT! Because saves and dupes can also be uploaded, as well as the ignorable bad addons, you get a wide selection of 7 year olds making bad poses, machines, prop constructions, and overly used memes, you're best not looking for them. And they usually aren't popular. But they are if they involve one thing.2. The Cancer of Five Nights at Freddy's"OH, GOODY, I'M GOING TO MADE FOXY ♥♥♥♥ FREDDY IN HIS GAPING ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥"- Every ♥♥♥♥ing FNaF fan ever.These guys. These walking tumours are usually too afraid to play the actual games themselves, but buy them to support their shrine for Scott Cawthon, download all the FNaF addons that Gmod has to offer, which are uploaded by 7 year olds with talent, and make really terribly posed ragdolls, usually beg for 5 stars, and then because of the amount of kids on Gmod because of an issue I haven't brought up, they make it to the front page of the Steam Workshop! Like, how even is that possible? And to add insult to injury, they also do it on the FNaF maps, but the ones with no events, because they're so ♥♥♥♥ing scared of the actual game. And then they ACTUALLY GET 5 STARS. A FIVE NIGHTS AT FREDDY'S SAVE MAKES IT TO THE FRONT PAGE AND PUSHES DESERVING ADDONS DOWN INTO THE CESSPIT OF HELL. The Community Now, as I'm sure you know, the game is filled to the brim with 10 year olds. This wasn't so prevalent back in the day, before the  Resonance Cascade  the introduction of a certain set of people.The YouTube Influx of 2013This basically ruined Gmod of today. The popular YouTubers brought in a wave of ♥♥♥♥ing fanboys who flocked to the servers running the gamemodes they were playing. People who actually played the more alternate gamemodes lost people, and then the servers running them died, transforming Garry's Mod into a lifeless husk of its former self, filled with kids and cancer. Conclusion Gmod is a game I simply cannot recommend based on these reasons, if you're wanting to play it for the extreme variety of gamemodes. If you want it to play with your friends, and ONLY your friends, it's a very fun game (This is literally the only reason I still play it.) But for any other reason, steer clear. This game is not what it once was.

content:
Posted: April 19, 2014
												This game is quite fun and can be very enjoyable though it has numerous problems.This game is extremely un-user friendly. Missing textures, missing maps, 1 hour load times for servers. I would say 20% of my Gmod play time has been loading screens. That is not an exaggeration. A positive of the game is that it is essentially an engine where many other games can exist, so while I have played this game the most out of any other game I have ever owned in my Steam library, it is really a game with many smaller games inside of it so it never gets "old". For it's price it is an amazing game which you will play for years to come but after playing this game for over 1000 hours I can begin to see it's faults. If your friends have this game and you don't...well then you better go buy it and join in on the fun!

												Garry's Mod is a physics sandbox. Unlike regular games there aren't any predefined aims or goals. We give you the tools and leave you to play. You spawn objects and weld them together to create your own contraptions - whether that's a car, a rocket, a catapult or something that doesn't have a name yet - that's up to you.

content:

												Personally I do enjoy this game and while this game certainly does have its ups and downs, I am not here to praise or criticize this game. I am here to offer a phenomenal 4 Cheese Ravioli recipe!Here are the ingredients you will need!Ravioli Dough: 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 pinch salt, 1 teaspoon olive oil, 2 eggs, 1 1/2 tablespoons water.Ravioli Filling: 1 (8 ounce) container ricotta cheese, 1 (4 ounce) package cream cheese, softened, 1/2 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, 1/2 cup provolone cheese, shredded, 1 egg, 1 1/2 teaspoons dried parsley.Pesto-Alfredo Cream Sauce: 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 cloves garlic, crushed, 3 tablespoons prepared basil pesto sauce, 2 cups heavy cream, 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese, 1 (24 ounce) jar marinara sauce.1. Mound the flour and salt together on a work surface and form a well. Beat the teaspoon of olive oil, 2 eggs, and water in a bowl. Pour half the egg mixture into the well. Begin mixing the egg with the flour with one hand; use your other hand to keep the flour mound steady. Add the remaining egg mixture and knead to form a dough.2. Knead the dough until smooth, 8 to 10 minutes; add more flour if the dough is too sticky. Form the dough into a ball and wrap tightly with plastic. Refrigerate for 1 hour.3. While the dough is resting, prepare the ravioli filling. Combine the ricotta cheese, cream cheese, mozzarella cheese, provolone cheese, egg, and parsley and mix well. Set the filling aside.4. Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the crushed garlic and pesto sauce and cook for one minute. Pour in the heavy cream, raise the heat to high, and bring the sauce to a boil. Reduce the heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Add the Parmesan cheese and stir until the cheese melts. Remove the pan from the heat and keep warm.5. Meanwhile, in a separate saucepan, warm the marinara sauce over medium-low heat.6. Preheat an oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Beat the egg with the tablespoon of water to make the egg wash.7. Roll out the pasta dough into thin sheets no thicker than a nickel. To assemble the ravioli, brush the egg wash over a sheet of pasta. Drop the filling mixture on the dough by teaspoonfuls about one inch apart. Cover the filling with the top sheet of pasta, pressing out the air from around each portion of filling. Press firmly around the filling to seal. Cut into individual ravioli with a knife or pizza cutter. Seal the edges.8. Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil over high heat. Stir in the ravioli, and return to a boil. Cook uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the ravioli float to the top and the filling is hot, 4 to 8 minutes. Drain well.9. Grease a baking sheet. Place the cooked ravioli on the sheet pan and bake in the preheated oven until brown, about 4 minutes.10. To serve the ravioli, divide them among four warmed serving bowls. Drizzle the marinara sauce over the ravioli and then top with the cream sauce.

number of helpful: 4 of 4 people (100%) found this review helpful
content:
Posted: April 4, 2014
												Gmod is a great game. It's got hours of fun and you can really do anything you can think of. The best part about it is that when you seem to have ran out of stuff to do, just go to the workshop. They usually have some really fun stuff for anybody. I also really like the multiplayer. I met a lot of good people and most of my friends on multiplayer. There is a lot of good game modes too from the mystery of murder or Trouble in Terrorrist Town (TTT) to the suspense of The Stalker (a Gmod version of The Hidden) and Prop Hunt. You can also play a game mode called DarkRP (Role Play) where you can pretend to be part of a society and you have a job and stuff like that. However if you just feel like building or fooling around with your friends then Sandbox is the game mode for you. Overall I really recommend this game to anybody. It's really awesome and definitely one of my favorite games. One thing you might want to be warned about though is that you might want Counter Strike Source when you get it because without it sometimes it has some issues with textures and stuff like that but that's pretty much it. I hope this review helped you and have fun! :D

Sure, there are the FPS-style modes like TTT, but if you just want to play at a much slower pace there are modes such as Cinema and SledBuild. Also, if you want to dedicate a lot of time into it, you can pose character models from, say, TF2, and create a stop-motion video. Garry's Mod satisfies a large variety of gamers with its different modes, and that makes it something special.

content:
Posted: July 1, 2014
												Garry's mod is wonderfully made, and is a staple for any Steam owner. The many gamemodes allow you to figure out what you enjoy doing. Don't like TTT? Try Dark RP. Don't like Dark RP? Try elevator source. There's so many, it's literally impossible to get bored with this game. Not to mention many, many laughs had in multiplayer. I would reccomend the multiplayer more than the singleplayer, just because it's that much more fun with other people. When you start out, though, just mess around in single player to figure out the controls and such. If you get bored with the regular content, there are thousands upon thousands of mods to download! This is a great game, and is getting better all the time.

content:
Posted: January 9, 2014
												Amazing game. Garry's Mod gives you the most hours of fun of any game, because there is so much to do. I personally like the Gamemodes more than Sandbox, but Sandbox can be quite fun with friends too. When you are done messing around with planes, tanks, Gordon Freeman and a refridgerator in Sandbox, you can play Trouble in Terrorist Town. When you are done with that, you can go and do Prop Hunt with some friends. After that you can do Zombie Survival, some Roleplay (which is one of the worst gamemodes in my opinion, but who am I?) or another gamemode of the many you can choose out. And afterwards, you can repeat the process! I definitely find Trouble in Terrorist Town with +/- 20 players the most fun of Garry's Mod, but pretty much anything on this game is fun! Highly recommended, this will give you a high playcount. 255 hours for me so far, many more to come. 9/10.

content:
Posted: January 22, 2014
												A truly wonderful game which has almost unlimited possibilities. Sure, there are the FPS-style modes like TTT, but if you just want to play at a much slower pace there are modes such as Cinema and SledBuild. Also, if you want to dedicate a lot of time into it, you can pose character models from, say, TF2, and create a stop-motion video. Garry's Mod satisfies a large variety of gamers with its different modes, and that makes it something special.

number of helpful: 4 of 4 people (100%) found this review helpful
content:
Posted: July 1, 2014
												Garry's mod is wonderfully made, and is a staple for any Steam owner. The many gamemodes allow you to figure out what you enjoy doing. Don't like TTT? Try Dark RP. Don't like Dark RP? Try elevator source. There's so many, it's literally impossible to get bored with this game. Not to mention many, many laughs had in multiplayer. I would reccomend the multiplayer more than the singleplayer, just because it's that much more fun with other people. When you start out, though, just mess around in single player to figure out the controls and such. If you get bored with the regular content, there are thousands upon thousands of mods to download! This is a great game, and is getting better all the time.

content:
Posted: July 3, 2011
												Garry's Mod (GMod) Developed by Garry Newman in his Facepunch Studios, is a Source engine powered sandbox game that is unbelievably funny.Released it 2004 (same year when Source engine was released) and it wasn't been forgotten since.1,000+ funny and useful addons to download in the Steam Workshop.You can do literally anything with the .lua and Source engine combined such as modelling and scripting.The not-so recent 13 update broke almost every addon that existed. But also added ALOT of new features. Such as Kinect controlling.Garry's Mod is an unforgettable game that made internet so funny with G-Man and TF2 classes.Main objective of this game is having fun and wasting time with friends or doing posters/videos.

content:
Posted: June 8, 2014
												This game was pretty much the basis of me becoming more interested in games, the same goes for alot of other gamers aswell. The wide variety of game modes and addons bring more hours of fun to the game. The funnest game modes for me were TTT, Basewars and Minigames, which is where I spent the majority of my Garry's Mod time. There are also servers that you can relax on, such as the Cinema servers, and watch what you and those around you are interested in. If you have yet to play/buy this game, I would really recommend you get this as I would describe it as a necessity for any PC Gamer.9.5/10

content:
Posted: July 20, 2014
												Garry's Mod is a must buy for anyone, not just certain people I think everyone will get a good slice out of this game.  As of now I've put in about 384 hours into this game and let me tell you every hour was filled with fun with friends and creativity.  This game is not only really cheap but there are so many things you can do prefering to your tastes. If you're more of a singleplayer person you can go into singleplayer sandbox and just build creations with the amazing tools this game gives you to create things.  Want to make a rocket bathtub? Just add some thrusters and your dreams come true.  Garry's Mod also has a wide selection of multiplayer gametypes also; Some famous ones are TTT, Murder, Prop Hunt, Hide and Seek and many others.  All in all this game is definitley reccomended and has a great workshop community. 10/10

number of helpful: 4 of 4 people (100%) found this review helpful
content:
Posted: May 5, 2014
												I have played garry's mod for a very long time.  Warning right now if you are going to get the game you will NEED counter strike soruce unless you want to play only singleplayer.  You can still play multiplayer without css but you will have no textures and you can't even see where you are.  This game combinds a lot of the soruce made games like half life series along with counterstrike soruce with some portal.  This can be fun for doing endless asortment of things on sandbox like screwing around with the charecters the physics like changing the gravity to installing addons or gamemodes that have a huge effect on the game.  This reminds me of minecraft in a way because minecraft once you get board of it you can just mod it to turn it more interesting.  Game still has not gotten old to me and I personaly think it is the best game I have ever played so far.  I highly recomend this game the only downside I can think of is when you are going on servers with a lot of addons like darkRP sometimes how they interact with your client/game can make it glitchy and cause problems.  This is easy to fix usauly just some lua errors.Deffinitly have to buy this game if you are considering it.  I have somewhere around 558 hours on the game.

number of helpful: 4 of 4 people (100%) found this review helpful
content:
Posted: January 23, 2014
												Garry's Mod is a modification for a Source Engine which gets you ability to create, destroy, build, connect, guide, fight, pose, construct, and mess around. You can do crearly ANYTHING.GameplayOn a spawn, you've got a set of standard weapons for HL2 (crowbar, gravity gun, pistol, 357, smg, ar2, shotgun, crossbow, rpg, grenade) and a special Physics Gun, which makes you able to manipulate props, people and whatever. You can spawn content from all (installed) Source Games and even download custom models/maps/sounds/saves/weapons/etc from a Steam Workshop. Playing multiplayer is as fun as playing alone. Crazy addons makes it even more fun!MultiplayerWell, its more fun than singleplayer - I just lied to you, sorry. In multiplayer you can't only build with people.. you can play random gamemodes like Prop Hunt, Trouble in Terrorist Town or Cinema! You can be a prop and hide from everyone; you can be a terrorist and act like a innocent man; you can watch YouTube videos with everyone... there are even gamemodes for racing and talking in public!WorkshopIt gives you very big ability to download and share your creations with others. Like I said: files/maps/models/textures/sounds/npcs/vehicles/helicopters/weapons and much much more makes you spend 15hours a day in a freakin Gmod.So...GMod is one of the most creative games I've ever played. Nothing more to say - this game is worth its price.9.5/10

content:
Posted: January 4, 2015
												Pros :+ TONS of fun community-created games+ Lots of cool mods that will help you in sandbox mode+ You're free to make anything.It's really fun.Cons :- Very hard to learn how to have fun in sandbox mode.Spent hours watching YouTube for Garry's Mod tutorials.- Yes,I understand they are trying to keep the classics.But don't you think it's better to make another version of Garry's Mod with improved graphics ?- Had a really hard time finding server with good pings and full of people.I guess no asians play this game.For those people who don't know what game is this,this game's main goal is to give you the power to make your own game.That's why I keep saying sandbox mode in Pros and Cons.There is a sandbox mode where you are completely free to do anything and to build anything.This is not a classic shooting game.But of course,there are a lot of completed games available for you to play.

												Pros :+ TONS of fun community-created games+ Lots of cool mods that will help you in sandbox mode+ You're free to make anything.It's really fun.Cons :- Very hard to learn how to have fun in sandbox mode.Spent hours watching YouTube for Garry's Mod tutorials.- Yes,I understand they are trying to keep the classics.But don't you think it's better to make another version of Garry's Mod with improved graphics ?- Had a really hard time finding server with good pings and full of people.I guess no asians play this game.For those people who don't know what game is this,this game's main goal is to give you the power to make your own game.That's why I keep saying sandbox mode in Pros and Cons.There is a sandbox mode where you are completely free to do anything and to build anything.This is not a classic shooting game.But of course,there are a lot of completed games available for you to play.

number of helpful: 4 of 4 people (100%) found this review helpful
content:
Posted: January 23, 2014
												Garry's Mod is a modification for a Source Engine which gets you ability to create, destroy, build, connect, guide, fight, pose, construct, and mess around. You can do crearly ANYTHING.GameplayOn a spawn, you've got a set of standard weapons for HL2 (crowbar, gravity gun, pistol, 357, smg, ar2, shotgun, crossbow, rpg, grenade) and a special Physics Gun, which makes you able to manipulate props, people and whatever. You can spawn content from all (installed) Source Games and even download custom models/maps/sounds/saves/weapons/etc from a Steam Workshop. Playing multiplayer is as fun as playing alone. Crazy addons makes it even more fun!MultiplayerWell, its more fun than singleplayer - I just lied to you, sorry. In multiplayer you can't only build with people.. you can play random gamemodes like Prop Hunt, Trouble in Terrorist Town or Cinema! You can be a prop and hide from everyone; you can be a terrorist and act like a innocent man; you can watch YouTube videos with everyone... there are even gamemodes for racing and talking in public!WorkshopIt gives you very big ability to download and share your creations with others. Like I said: files/maps/models/textures/sounds/npcs/vehicles/helicopters/weapons and much much more makes you spend 15hours a day in a freakin Gmod.So...GMod is one of the most creative games I've ever played. Nothing more to say - this game is worth its price.9.5/10

 For a game like this that was made in 2006... I really missed out on a lot back in the good old days of steamGarry's Mod is a very intresting game with some quite detailed and fun mods made from the "Steam Workshop" that our lovely people in the Steam Community has made for us too use. Before we go with anything else, let me list what I find intresting about this game :~ Gamemode's change this whole game into something new that we play and have fun with~ Sandbox one of the most popular gamemodes (for Singleplayer) to test Mods and make Posters~ DarkRP one of the most popular things for Garry's Mod and maybe the most fun thing to do, the first time I can actually roleplay in a video game 10/10~ Maps... the maps people made are just very creative and most of them are really great to use for making posters or to like play a gamemode like Zombie Survival, Horror Story, TTT, and Prop Hunt~ Achivements. The achivements in this game are pretty crazy when I think about it, like... "waste a year playing gmod" like do you want me to play this game for a whole year!?!? that is pretty insane but intresting I recommend this game if you love having to do whatever you want, because this game is basically like so many choices to pick and you can do whatever you want.

												Garry's Mod is one of my favourites games if not my favourite. What I love most about it is, if you can think of it you can probably do it for example attaching a missile to a bus and watch it explode high up above you or just walking around as a chicken. With more than 430,000 mods on the Steam Workshop for Gmod. The variety in this game is huge to say the least. When I'm not experimenting with missiles I'm on a role-play server madly chasing a rebel in a stolen car try to get my car that's been stolen back.For the price of £5.99 (cheaper if its on sale which it often is) you can't really go wrong with this game. I now have over a thousand hours game time and would highly recommend it to everyone its amazing!

content:
Posted: January 25, 2015
												Good things:-*Decent Graphics.*Variety of Gamemodes to play on.*Offers Coders a chance to show off thier skills over Customly Coded Servers or Workshop content.*A Very funny game with a Full Physics Manipulation Experience.*Lots of Content to choose from and download Including Maps,Weapons,Playermodels,Content.Bad things:-*Young Trolls and Minges.*Game bugs occuring usually after certain updates due to Garry Breaking things in the game.*Lots of Content Needed for decent Servers.Overall Rating:-I Would rate this game 9.5/10,This game is a very fun game Offering me a Full Experience of Variety of Gamemodes such as Sandbox where Physics laws are proven to be useless and Building Large buildings as some one simply destructs it all with a Explosive barrel or such and TTT In-Which you are on the search for a Traitory terrorist or even become one and Work your way Onto killing all Innocents without being Noticed In order to survive or Deathrun as you run with other people attempting to avoid traps and gain Pointshop points to Buy new hats or Playermodels or even weapons or TDM In-which you join a certain team depending on the TDM Gamemode,Such as US/RU or VC/US And Variety of more classes depending on the server Or Pirate wars as you join a Adventoures Journey with your friends and Become a Red Coat and attempt to sink Pirates Ship or Vice Versa,However on Each Gamemode,There are these Picky Young trolling Minges,I've managed to adapt with most of them at most Cases,But its hard to do so,Overall I recommend you this game And by Judging from my Playtime its Totally Recommnd this game for Any sort of Person as this Game offers you more than 1Gamemode and each with a Diffrent Category of Options.

content:
Posted: January 12, 2015
												Garry's Mod is one of those games you look at and think: "Wow, this is really stupid", but then you buy it, and you exchange it for your soul. This game is addicting, mainly the multiplayer portions, where you have quite a few minigames, each you'll invest about a week of gametime into, or more or less, depending on your taste in games. Even if you dislike all of the games somehow, you can create your own mod or map using the sandbox on either single player or multiplayer. This game gives you everything you might want to do in general terms, and the only negativity you may recieve may come from unfortunate minor glitches or perhaps being in a messy server. Otherwise, buckle up and have fun!

content:
Posted: May 17, 2015
												Garry's Mod is a physics sandbox. Unlike regular games there aren't any predefined aims or goals. We give you the tools and leave you to play. You spawn objects and weld them together to create your own contraptions - whether that's a car, a rocket, a catapult or something that doesn't have a name yet - that's up to you. If you're not too great at construction - don't worry! You can place a variety of characters in silly positionsYou can go on servers with different gamemodes its amazing.

content:
Posted: June 12, 2015
												I don't know what to say about this game, so here is a recipe for pancakes, Ingredients:4tbsp plain flour (about 100g)1 large free range egg½ pint semi-skimmed milk + water (about 300ml - ¾ milk ¼ water)Pinch of saltButter for fryingHow to make pancakes:Sieve the flour and salt into a large bowl and make a well in the mixture.Break in the egg and stir to make a breadcrumby mix.In a jug add 1/3 of a pint of milk and top up with water to make 1/2 a pint (200ml milk, 100ml water) - this makes a lovely light batter.Add the milk and the water mix bit by bit, beating constantly to avoid lumps.Tip:*If you have a food processor just throw all the ingredients in and zap until smooth!Pop a large frying pan over a medium heat.Add a large knob of butter (roughly 50g) and melt.Pour the excess butter into a small bowl and reserve it for later.Using a ladle pour a spoonful of the pancake batter into the hot pan and swirl to get a full covering - cook for about 1 min each side (it's ready when it's easy to flip over).Serve immediately with sugar and lemon or other exciting toppings. We love cheese and Marmite for an extra British twist! Delicious!!
